Is human evolution speeding up or slowing down? - Laurence Hurst[1]
What Happened Before History? Human Origins[2]

How Evolution works[4]

JANE[7]
Jane's interview - FRANCE[8]
What separates us from chimpanzees? by Jane Goodall[9]
Beautiful Minds, Professor Richard Dawkins[10]
